attributes.action: Urge the reduction of the difference between diesel and unleaded at the pumps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the fuel crisis started there was approx a 5p/litre difference, now there is upto 14p difference between diesel and unleaded.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/cutdiesel/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
